trans-unit.source: Represents a pop-up window that has content.
**Content Model**: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> has one content property: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Child%2A>.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> can have a maximum of one child, which can be any <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 는 최대 하나일 수 있습니다는 하나의 자식만 있을 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control that has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> as its parent.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 된 컨트롤을 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> 부모로 합니다.

trans-unit.source: ![Popup illustration](~/add/media/popuppicture.JPG "Popup illustration")

You can position a popup by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여 팝업을 배치할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is displayed on the screen, it does not reposition itself if its parent is repositioned.
trans-unit.target: 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 표시 되는 화면에 이전 위치를 자체 부모 위치가 변경 되 면입니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> displays its content in its own window on the screen.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 별도 창 화면에서 해당 콘텐츠를 표시 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control supports animation when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> property is set to `true` and the application is running with full trust.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 컨트롤은 애니메이션 지원 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> 속성이로 설정 되어 `true` 응용 프로그램이 완전 신뢰로 실행 되 고 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An application that is running with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the user's system.
trans-unit.target: 완전 신뢰로 실행 되는 응용 프로그램 시스템 리소스에 액세스할 수 있으며 일반적으로 사용자의 시스템에 설치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md).

For bitmap and opacity effects to appear on the content of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>, you must set the effects directly on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> content.
trans-unit.target: 내용에 표시할 비트맵 및 불투명 효과 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>에서 직접 효과 설정 해야 합니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 콘텐츠입니다.

trans-unit.source: The content of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> does not inherit effects that are set on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control or on any other element that is in the parent window.
trans-unit.target: 콘텐츠는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 에 설정 된 효과 상속 하지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 제어 또는 다른 요소에 부모 창에 가장 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is sized to its content by default.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 기본적으로 해당 콘텐츠 크기가 조정 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: When this occurs, applying a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A> or bitmap effects may cause the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> to be obscured.
trans-unit.target: 이 경우 적용 한 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.RenderTransform%2A> 비트맵 효과 발생할 수 있습니다 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 흐려지는 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This occurs because the default size of the content does not provide enough area for the effects to display.
trans-unit.target: 기본 크기는 콘텐츠의 효과를 표시할에 대 한 충분 한 영역을 제공 하지 않으므로이 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If more space is required, you can define a margin around the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> content to increase the area that is available to the control.
trans-unit.target: 더 많은 공간이 필요한 경우에 주위에 여백의 정의할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 콘텐츠 컨트롤에 사용할 수 있는 영역을 증가 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> property must be set on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> when used in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Parent%2A> 에 속성을 설정 해야는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 에서 사용 될 때는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: To create a tooltip, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> classes.
trans-unit.target: 도구 설명을 만들려면를 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTip> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ToolTipService> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ToolTip Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tooltip-overview.md).
The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: 만드는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> class.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control can contain transparent content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 컨트롤이 투명 콘텐츠를 포함할 수 있는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control can contain transparent content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 컨트롤이 투명 콘텐츠를 포함할 수 있으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 포함할 수 없으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control can only contain transparent content when the application runs with full trust.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 응용 프로그램이 완전 신뢰로 실행 될 때 컨트롤에서 투명 한 콘텐츠만 포함할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: An application that runs with full trust has complete access to system resources and is typically installed on the local system.
trans-unit.target: 완전 신뢰로 실행 되는 응용 프로그램 시스템 리소스에 액세스할 수 있으며 일반적으로 로컬 시스템에 설치 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Security (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/security-wpf.md).
This property cannot be set to `true` when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is hosted in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 이 속성 설정할 수 없습니다 `true` 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 에서 호스팅되는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winfxwebapp](~/includes/tlasharptla-winfxwebapp-md.md)]합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> property is set to `true` in an application that does not run in full trust, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> property value is changed to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> 속성이 `true` 완전 신뢰에서 실행 되지 않는 응용 프로그램에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> 에 속성 값이 변경 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: An application that is hosted in a browser is an example of an application that does not run in full trust.
trans-unit.target: 브라우저에서 호스트 하는 응용 프로그램은 완전 신뢰에서 실행 되지 않는 응용 프로그램의 예입니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> property on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> 속성에는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: for setting this property to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 이 속성을 설정 하는 것에 대 한 <see langword="true" />합니다.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> dependency property.
[Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)
Gets or sets the content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> content of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
The default is <see langword="null" />.
**Content Model**: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Child%2A> property is the only content property for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: **콘텐츠 모델**:는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Child%2A> 속성에 대 한 콘텐츠 속성은는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> can only have one <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> as a child, but that child can contain complex embedded content.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 하나만 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 으로 자식, 이지만 해당 자식에 포함 된 복잡 한 콘텐츠 포함 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, the child can be a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> that contains an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>, text, and other types of controls.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 자식 될 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.StackPanel> 를 포함 하는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image>, 텍스트 및 다른 형식의 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: When content is added to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control becomes the logical parent to the content.
trans-unit.target: 에 콘텐츠가 추가 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 컨트롤은 콘텐츠에 논리적 부모가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> content is considered to be the logical child of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 마찬가지로,는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 콘텐츠의 논리적 자식으로 간주 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: 자식 콘텐츠를 포함 하는 시각적 트리에 추가 되지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window with its own visual tree when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 자식 콘텐츠 고유한 시각적으로 별도 창에서 렌더링 되는 대신, 트리에서 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> 로 설정 된 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to add content to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 콘텐츠를 추가 하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Child" /> dependency property.
Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> property changes to <see langword="false" />.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is opened and closed by toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property.
The following example shows how to define an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Closed> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 이벤트 처리기를 정의 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Closed> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> to which to add child content.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> child content.
Attaches a child element to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
You might want to create a custom control that has the same functionality as an existing control and also exhibits the behavior of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 동일한 기능을 기존 컨트롤의 동작을 나타내기도 및 사용자 지정 컨트롤을 만들 수도 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can make your control behave like a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> by adding a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> to your control and calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CreateRootPopup%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 처럼 동작 하도록 컨트롤을 만들 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 추가 하 여 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 제어 및 호출에는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CreateRootPopup%2A> 메서드.

trans-unit.source: This method assigns `child` to the child property and binds the following properties to `child`.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드를 할당 `child` 자식 속성에 다음 속성을 바인딩합니다 `child`합니다.

trans-unit.source: You should implement these as dependency properties in your control so it can be used the same way as a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 사용할 수 있도록 컨트롤에서 종속성 속성에는 동일한 방식으로 사용 되는 이러한 구현 해야는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>합니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Custom Dependency Properties](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/custom-dependency-properties.md).
When you call <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CreateRootPopup%2A>, `child` cannot be a child of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>.
trans-unit.target: 호출 하는 경우 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CreateRootPopup%2A>, `child` 의 자식이 될 수 없습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Also, `PlacementTarget` should be set on your control before you call this method.
trans-unit.target: 또한 `PlacementTarget` 이 메서드를 호출 하기 전에 사용자 컨트롤에 설정 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a delegate handler method that positions the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 컨트롤의 위치를 지정하는 위임 처리기 메서드를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback" /> delegate method that provides placement information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 컨트롤에 대한 배치 정보를 제공하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback" /> 대리자 메서드입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to set a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CustomPopupPlacementCallback%2A> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.CustomPopupPlacementCallback%2A> 위임 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.CustomPopupPlacementCallback" /> dependency property.
Returns the logical parent of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />.

If the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> does not have a defined parent and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> is not <see langword="null" />, the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />에 정의된 부모가 없고 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />이 <see langword="null" />이 아닌 경우 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" />이 반환됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the return values are the same as <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetUIParentCore" />.
trans-unit.target: 그렇지 않은 경우 반환 값은 <see cref="M:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.GetUIParentCore" />와 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> is displayed with a drop shadow effect.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />을 그림자 효과로 표시하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> is displayed with a drop shadow; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />을 그림자 효과로 표시하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A drop shadow effect displays when the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property are set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 그림자 효과 표시 시기는 <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.DropShadow%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 속성이로 설정 되어 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to get the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HasDropShadow%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 값을 가져오는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HasDropShadow%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HasDropShadow" /> dependency property.
The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HasDropShadow%2A> dependency property.
[Dependency Properties Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/dependency-properties-overview.md)
Get or sets the horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 대상 원점과 팝업 맞춤 지점 간의 가로 거리를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The horizontal distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 대상 원점과 팝업 맞춤 지점 간의 가로 거리입니다.

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 대상 원점 및 팝업 맞춤 지점에 대 한 정보를 참조 하십시오. [팝업 배치 동작](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.

You can position a popup by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여 팝업을 배치할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Values
A string representation of a <xref:System.Double> value.
This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 이 값으로 해석 되는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 측정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 문자열을 명시적으로 소수점을 포함할 필요가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of `1` is acceptable.
The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions apply as those that are mentioned in the Property Value section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: 동일한 <xref:System.Double> 이 항목의 속성 값 섹션에서 설명 하는 것과 범위 제한 사항이 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A `double` value as described earlier in this table, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, or `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A `double` 단위 선언 문자열 중 하나를 통해 다음이 표의 앞에 설명 된 대로 값: `px`, `in`, `cm`, 또는 `pt`합니다.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
`in` is inches; 1in=96px
`cm` is centimeters; 1cm=(96/2.54) px
`pt` is points; 1pt=(96/72) px

The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A> properties to 20.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 설정 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A> 속성을 20입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Bottom> (which is the default), so the target origin is the bottom left corner of the target area and the popup alignment point is the top left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> 속성이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Bottom> (기본값) 인 있기 때문에 대상 원본이 대상 영역의 왼쪽된 아래 모서리 속도가 팝업 맞춤 지점의 왼쪽된 위 모퉁이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> is visible.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />의 표시 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The default is <see langword="false" />.

If a control uses a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> as part of its default style, bind the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> to a property of the control.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤을 사용 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 의 기본 스타일의 일환으로, 바인딩는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> 속성의는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 을 컨트롤의 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> can bind its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen%2A> property to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> 바인딩할 수 해당 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox.IsDropDownOpen%2A> 속성을는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>합니다.

trans-unit.source: This simplifies the logic for controlling when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is visible.
trans-unit.target: 시기를 제어 논리를 간소화이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 표시 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> dependency property.
Gets an enumerator that you can use to access the logical child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 컨트롤의 논리적 자식 요소에 액세스하는 데 사용할 수 있는 열거자를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> that you can use to access the logical child elements of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator" /> 컨트롤의 논리적 자식 요소에 액세스하는 데 사용할 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
When you add content to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control becomes the logical parent to the content.
trans-unit.target: 콘텐츠를 추가 하는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 컨트롤의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 컨트롤은 콘텐츠에 논리적 부모가 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> content is considered to be the logical child of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: 마찬가지로,는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 콘텐츠의 논리적 자식으로 간주 됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The child content is not added to the visual tree that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: 자식 콘텐츠를 포함 하는 시각적 트리에 추가 되지 않습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the child content is rendered in a separate window that has its own visual tree when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 고유한 시각적 창이 자식 콘텐츠를 렌더링할 대신 트리에서 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> 속성이 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The available size that this element can give to the child.
trans-unit.target: 이 요소에서 자식 요소에 할당할 수 있는 크기입니다.

trans-unit.source: You can use infinity as a value to indicate that the element can size to whatever content is available.
trans-unit.target: 요소의 크기를 사용할 수 있는 콘텐츠에 맞게 조정할 수 있음을 나타내려면 값을 무한대로 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines the required size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> content within the visual tree of the logical parent.
trans-unit.target: 논리적 부모의 시각적 트리 내에서 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 콘텐츠의 필요한 크기를 결정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> structure that has the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Height" /> and <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Width" /> properties both equal to zero (0).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Size" /> 및 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Height" /> 속성이 모두 0으로 설정된 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Size.Width" /> 구조체입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method always returns a <xref:System.Windows.Size> that has a width and height of zero (0), because <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> content is not located in the visual tree of its logical parent or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드는 항상 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Size> 된 너비 및 높이 영 (0) 때문에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 콘텐츠 폴더에 논리 부모의 시각적 트리 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The child content is created in a different window that has its own visual tree.
trans-unit.target: 자식 콘텐츠 시각적 트리의 있는 다른 창에 만들어집니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Responds when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> property changes from to <see langword="true" /> to <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> 속성 값이 <see langword="true" />에서 <see langword="false" />로 변경될 때 응답합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
Responds to the condition in which the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> property changes from <see langword="false" /> to <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> 속성 값이 <see langword="false" />에서 <see langword="true" />로 변경되는 조건에 응답합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown" /> event.

This implementation makes sure that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> closes when a mouse event occurs outside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현을 사용 하면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 외부 마우스 이벤트가 발생할 때 닫습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> 속성이로 설정 되어 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseLeftButtonUp" /> event.

This implementation makes sure that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> closes when a mouse event occurs outside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현을 사용 하면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 외부 마우스 이벤트가 발생할 때 닫습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> 속성이로 설정 되어 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseRightButtonUp" /> event.

This implementation makes sure that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> closes when a mouse event occurs outside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현을 사용 하면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 외부 마우스 이벤트가 발생할 때 닫습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> 속성이로 설정 되어 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Provides class handling for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.UIElement.PreviewMouseRightButtonDown" /> event.

This implementation makes sure that a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> closes when a mouse event occurs outside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 이 구현을 사용 하면는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 외부 마우스 이벤트가 발생할 때 닫습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> 속성이로 설정 되어 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> property changes to <see langword="true" />.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is opened and closed by toggling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property.
The following example shows how to define an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Opened> event.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 이벤트 처리기를 정의 하는 방법을 보여 주는 다음 예제는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Opened> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control when the control opens, and specifies the behavior of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control when it overlaps screen boundaries.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 컨트롤이 열리는 방향을 가져오거나 설정하고 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 컨트롤이 화면 경계와 겹칠 때의 동작을 지정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode" /> enumeration value that determines the orientation of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control when the control opens, and that specifies how the control interacts with screen boundaries.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode" /> 컨트롤이 열리는 방향을 결정하고 해당 컨트롤이 화면 경계와 상호 작용하는 방식을 지정하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Bottom" />.

You can position a popup by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여 팝업을 배치할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).

If the <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuDropAlignment%2A> property is `true`, setting <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Left> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Right> reverses the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>; a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> with <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Left> aligns its left edge with the right edge of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> with <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Right> aligns its right edge with the left edge of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.SystemParameters.MenuDropAlignment%2A> 속성은 `true`설정 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> 를 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Left> 또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Right> 위치를 반대로 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>; <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 와 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> 로 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Left> 의 왼쪽된 가장자리에 맞춥니다.는 가장자리 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 와 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> 로 설정 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Right> 의 왼쪽된 가장자리와 해당 오른쪽 가장자리 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example creates four <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> controls that are relative to an image.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예에서는 4 개의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 이미지를 기준으로 하는 컨트롤입니다.

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> has a different value for the placement property.
trans-unit.target: 각 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 배치 속성에 대 한 다른 값이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the rectangle relative to which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control is positioned when it opens.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 컨트롤이 열리는 위치의 기준이 되는 사각형을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The rectangle that is used to position the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
The default is <see langword="null" />.

You can position a popup by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여 팝업을 배치할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Rect.X%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Y%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Width%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Height%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A> are 50, 50, 50, and 100, respectively.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> is relative to the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A> property.

Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A> property does not create a visible element in the application; the example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle> with the same bounds to represent the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A> 속성 응용 프로그램에 표시 되는 요소를 만들지 않습니다;이 예에서는 만듭니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Rectangle> 를 나타내는 동일한 범위의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets the element relative to which the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> is positioned when it opens.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" />이 열리는 위치의 기준이 되는 요소를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is the logical parent of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
The default is <see langword="null" />.

You can position a popup by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여 팝업을 배치할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None

The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> that is the child of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>, and sets <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> to `ellipse1`, so the popup is relative to the <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 의 자식인은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>, 설정 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> 를 `ellipse1`popup을 기준으로 하므로 <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets an animation for the opening and closing of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 컨트롤의 열기 및 닫기 동작에 사용되는 애니메이션을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PopupAnimation" /> enumeration value that defines an animation to open and close a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PopupAnimation" /> 컨트롤을 열고 닫기 위한 애니메이션을 정의하는 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 열거형 값입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PopupAnimation.None" />.
A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> can only animate when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 만 애니메이션을 적용할 수는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.AllowsTransparency%2A> 속성이 `true`합니다.

trans-unit.source: This requires the application that creates the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control to run with full trust.
trans-unit.target: 그러려면 만드는 응용 프로그램의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 완전 신뢰로 실행을 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> is animated, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> will not be animated.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A> 애니메이션 효과가 적용 되어는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 애니메이션이 적용 되지 것입니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PopupAnimation%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PopupAnimation%2A> 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PopupAnimation" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control closes when the control is no longer in focus.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 컨트롤에 더 이상 포커스가 없으면 해당 컨트롤이 닫히는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control closes when <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> property is set to <see langword="false" />; <see langword="false" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control closes when a mouse or keyboard event occurs outside the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 속성이 <see langword="true" />로 설정된 경우에만 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen" /> 컨트롤이 종류 될때 <see langword="false" />이며, <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 컨트롤 외부에서 마우스나 키보드 이벤트가 발생한 경우 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup" /> 컨트롤이 종류되면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.

When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> property is set to `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> stays open until it is explicitly closed by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> 속성이로 설정 되어 `true`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 설정 하 여 명시적으로 닫힐 때까지 열린 상태로 유지 되는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.IsOpen%2A> 속성을 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> is `false`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control intercepts all mouse and keyboard events to determine when one of these events occurs outside the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> control.
trans-unit.target: 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> 은 `false`, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 컨트롤 외부 이러한 이벤트 중 하나가 시기를 결정할 모든 마우스 및 키보드 이벤트를 가로채는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen%2A> 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.StaysOpen" /> dependency property.
An object to add as a child.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 인프라를 지원하며 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 인프라를 지원하며 코드에서 직접 사용할 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 대상 원점과 팝업 맞춤 지점 간의 세로 거리를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The vertical distance between the target origin and the popup alignment point.
trans-unit.target: 대상 원점과 팝업 맞춤 지점 간의 세로 거리입니다.

trans-unit.source: For information about the target origin and popup alignment point, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
trans-unit.target: 대상 원점 및 팝업 맞춤 지점에 대 한 정보를 참조 하십시오. [팝업 배치 동작](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.

You can position a popup by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> properties.
trans-unit.target: 설정 하 여 팝업을 배치할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementTarget%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.PlacementRectangle%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffsetProperty> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Popup Placement Behavior](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/popup-placement-behavior.md).
XAML Attribute Usage
XAML Values
A string representation of a <xref:System.Double> value.
This is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
trans-unit.target: 이 값으로 해석 되는 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] 측정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Strings do not have to explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 문자열을 명시적으로 소수점을 포함할 필요가 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of `1` is acceptable.
The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions apply as those that are mentioned in the Property Value section of this topic.
trans-unit.target: 동일한 <xref:System.Double> 이 항목의 속성 값 섹션에서 설명 하는 것과 범위 제한 사항이 적용 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A `double` value as described earlier in this table, followed by one of the following unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, or `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A `double` 단위 선언 문자열 중 하나를 통해 다음이 표의 앞에 설명 된 대로 값: `px`, `in`, `cm`, 또는 `pt`합니다.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)]
`in` is inches; 1in=96px
`cm` is centimeters; 1cm=(96/2.54) px
`pt` is points; 1pt=(96/72) px
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None

The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> and sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A> properties to 20.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup> 설정 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.HorizontalOffset%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset%2A> 속성을 20입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Bottom> (which is the default), so the target origin is the bottom left corner of the target area, and the popup alignment point is the top left corner of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.Placement%2A> 속성이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.PlacementMode.Bottom> (기본값) 인 있기 때문에 대상 원본이 대상 영역의 왼쪽된 아래 모서리 속도가 팝업 맞춤 지점의 왼쪽된 위 모퉁이 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Popup.VerticalOffset" /> dependency property.
